hadiths.text: It was narrated from Zubair bin 'Awwam that :he gave a horse called Ghamr or Ghamrah to someone, then he saw one of its colts or fillies attributed to his horse being sold, but he refrained from (buging) it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ تَصَدَّقَ بِصَدَقَةٍ فَوَجَدَهَا تُبَاعُ هَلْ يَشْتَرِيهَا
chapter.eng-name: One Who Gives Charity Then Finds His Gift Being Sold - Should He Buy It ?
